name: Amethyst Shard
effect text: Gain 1꒔. Any ally may draw a card and then discard a card in hand.
flavor text: There is an irony to the weaponsmith that is best described as blunt.

name: Buried Light
effect text: Cast: Deal 1 damage. Gain 1꒔.
flavor text: Hers is a fire that burns bright and with a single purpose: to deliver us back to The World That Was, no matter what cost.

name: Emerald Shard
effect text:
Gain 1꒔.
OR
Any player gains 1 life.
flavor text: The caves run deep in Gravehold, ssome say to a shadow city even older than time. Yet none have delved as deep as Kadir.

name: Flare
effect text: Cast: Reveal the top card of the turn order deck, and then place it back on top of the turn order deck. If you revealed a player turn order card, deal 3 damage. Otherwise, deal 1 damage.
flavor text: The other mages do not fully trust Xaxos, for there is a darkness they perceive in his words.

name: Garnet Shard
effect text:
Gain 1꒔.
OR
Cast any player's prepped spell.
flavor text: Thrice has she walked into the breach to face them, a feat not yet attempted by other mages.

name: Moonstone Shard
effect text: Gain 1꒔. Gain an additional 1꒔ that can only be used to gain a gem.
flavor text: Like many children of Gravehold, Jian was left an orphan, stricken silent by the very thing that took her father's light.

name: Quartz Shard
effect text: Gain 1꒔. Reveal the top card of the turn order deck. You may place that card on the bottom or the top of the turn order deck. If you revealed a player turn order card, gain an additional 1꒔.
flavor text: Laughter is scarce these days in Gravehold, yet Lash manages to conjure a smile in most he meets.

name: Tourmaline Shard
effect text: Gain 1꒔. Any ally may suffer 1 damage. If they do, they destroy a card in hand.
flavor text: Phaedraxa is burdened with a sense beyond sight. Only she remembers The World That Was.

effect text: Gain 1꒔.
flavor text: The aether is trapped in even the simplest of stones. Now these gems grant us the same power that put our world low. - Brama, Breach Mage Elder

flavor text: The sister-mages of old would wear their talismans as a symbol of their station and a warning to those that would challenge them.

flavor text: In The World That Was, there were great birds, born of fire and ash. They were thought to be immortal, and yet none now remain. - Malastar, Breach Mage Mentor

flavor text: Sometimes a little motivation is needed for dire situations. - Z'hana, Breach Mage Renegade

name: Agony Field
effect text:
To Discard: Destroy a card in hand that costs 2꒔ or more.
Power 2: Unleash. Any player discards three cards in hand and then draws one card.
flavor text: Every breath is torment. - Nerva, Survivor

name: Bane Sire
effect text: Persistent: Unleash.
flavor text: Best to kill these first. - Reeve, Breach Mage Elite

name: Bleed Static
effect text: Power 3: The player with the most prepped spells suffers 2 damage for each of their prepped spells.
flavor text: There are no words to describe the sound of a breach opening. Only the screams echoing off the cave walls after. - Z'hana, Breach Mage Renegade

name: Eye of Nothing
effect text:
To Discard: Spend 6꒔.
Power 2: Unleash twice.
flavor text: We toy with forces we barely comprehend. - Z'hana, Breach Mage Renegade

name: Haze Spewer
effect text: Persistent: Gravehold suffers damage equal to this minion's current life. Then, this minion suffers 1 damage.
flavor text: The fumes they belch are so caustic that they rarely live long themselves.

name: Skewer
effect text: Unleash. Any player suffers 3 damage and draws a card.
flavor text: It takes years to train a breach mage properly, but only a second to snuff one out. - Malastar, Breach Mage Mentor

name: Slaughter
effect text: Unleash. Gravehold suffers 3 damage.
flavor text: We have nothing left to lose but our lives. - Mist, Breach Mage Dagger Captain

name: Woven Sky
effect text:
To Discard: Discard three cards in hand.
Power 2: Unleash. Any player suffers 4 damage.
flavor text: Nym looked up in awe as Malastar pointed to the roiling air at the dome of the cave. Those, boy, are stars.

name: Awaken
effect text:
Unleash twice and Gravehold suffers 3 damage.
OR
Place the most recently discarded minion card in the nemesis discard pile back into play.
flavor text: They were always just outside the edge of our knowing, sitting there in some quiet abyss just waiting to visit ruin upon us. - Z'hana, Breach Mage Renegade

name: Cauterizer
effect text:
When damage is dealt to this minion, reduce that damage to 1.
Persistent: Any player suffers damage equal to this minion's current life.
flavor text: Hack away all you like, youngling. It will only grow back another... whatever that part is. - Adelheim, Breach Mage Weaponsmith

name: Dispel
effect text: Unleash twice. The player with the most prepped spells discards their most expensive prepped spell.
flavor text: The words and gestures needed left him, and the breach grew dim. - Nerva, Survivor

name: Needlemaw
effect text: Persistent: Gravehold suffers 2 damage.
flavor text: The teeth of this beast make a fine trophy. The trick is keeping all your fingers in the taking of them. - Reeve, Breach Mage Elite

name: Lay Waste
effect text: Unleash twice. Any player suffers 2 damage.
flavor text: Gravehold sat silent and forgotten for a thousand ages before The Nameless came. No one remembers for whom this vast city was built. Those stories lay in the ash outside the cave with the bones of those who once told them.

name: Pulverizing Ray
effect text: Power 1: Gravehold suffers 18 damage. The players may collectively discard up to six gems. For each gem discarded this way, prevent 3 of that damage.
flavor text: The ground absorbed the latent energy left by the first breaches ever opened. Without this to fuel our spells, our fate would be certain. - Malastar, Breach Mage Mentor

name: Venomite
effect text:
Persistent: The player with the lowest life suffers 2 damage.
OR
Any player discards a prepped spell that costs 3꒔ or more.
flavor text: In The World That Was, there were many creatures that used poison as a means of survival. But these things ARE poison. - Lash, Breach Mage Scout

name: Doom Aegis
effect text:
To Discard: Spend 7꒔.
Power 1: The player with the most charges suffers 4 damage and loses all of their charges.
flavor text: There is a saying: all wars must end. - Nerva, Survivor

name: Gather Darkness
effect text: Any player places their discard pile on top of their deck, shuffles it, and then destroys the top four cards of their deck. Then, Unleash twice.
flavor text: The Nameless do not die, for they themselves are death. - Xaxos, Breach Mage Adept

name: Jagged One
effect text: Persistent: Unleash twice.
flavor text: Jagged ones are the heralds of The Nameless, leading legions in siege after siege of Gravehold.

name: Obliterate
effect text: Unleash twice. The player with the most opened breaches destroys four cards in hand or suffers 4 damage.
flavor text: While the breaches amplify our magic a thousandfold, it comes at the highest ransom imaginable. - Brama, Breach Mage Elder

name: Reality Rupture
effect text:
To Discard: Destroy two prepped spells that each cost 3꒔ or more.
Power 1: Unleash three times.
flavor text: The world shattered in a blink, and in the ruin I glimpsed the other side of the void. - Phaedraxa, Breach Mage Seer

name: Sunder
effect text:
Gravehold suffers 4 damage and the player with the lowest life suffers 4 damage.
OR
Shuffle all of the nemesis turn order cards into the turn order deck.
flavor text: We fight for the lingering hope of returning to The World That Was, but in our hearts we know our future lies within these caves. - Z'hana, Breach Mage Renegade

name: Topple
effect text: Unleash twice. Gravehold suffers 4 damage.
flavor text: LOOK OU--, Last words of Quilion Rafe, Far Hollow watchman

name: Broodwomb
effect text:
If there is at least one husk in play, prevent all damage dealt to this minion.
Persistent: Place a husk in play.
flavor text: It is the husk-mother, spewing multitudes through the void into Gravehold.

name: Endless Throng
effect text: Carapace Queen Swarms.
flavor text: The Queen, she is the worst of their foul lot, for her young are without number. - Mist, Breach Mage Dagger Captain

name: Hatch
effect text: Place a husk into play for each turn order card in the turn order discard pile.
flavor text: The Queen wears her offspring like some writhing armor.

name: Blot the Sun
effect text:
To Discard: Lose 4 charges.
Power 2: Carapace Queen Swarms. Unleash. Carapace Queen Swarms.
flavor text: Were we still in The World That Was, these wretched things would envelop the very sky. - Malastar, Breach Mage Mentor

name: Foul Multitudes
effect text:
Husks have 2 life. Damaged husks heal to full life at the end of each turn.
Immediately: Unleash.
Power 3: Carapace Queen Swarms.
flavor text: It took the survivors of Gravehold half-a-moon to shovel up the dead husks and carry them into the depths, where they now lie in piles high enough to touch the tops of the cave vaults.

name: Infest
effect text:
Carapace Queen Swarms twice.
OR
Any player suffers 4 damage.
flavor text: Husks are easy enough to dispatch... one on one, that is. - Lash, Breach Mage Scout

name: Legion Beacon
effect text:
Immediately: Unleash twice.
Power 2: Discard half of the husks in play, rounded up. Gravehold suffers 2 damage for each husks discarded this way. Carapace Queen Swarms.
flavor text: Gravehold knows when the Queen is near, for the claxon call of her legions echoes throughout the cave.

name: Maggot Engine
effect text:
Immediately: Unleash three times. Then, set this minion's life equal to twice the number of husks in play.
Persistent: Carapace Queen Swarms.
flavor text: Which end is the head? - Nym, Breach Apprentice

name: Spawn
effect text: Carapace Queen Swarms. Unleash. Carapace Queen Swarms.
flavor text: The sound of the things, skittering across the cave walls, is loud enough to drown our screams. - Nerva, Survivor

name: Burden
effect text: The players collectively gain two corruptions and place them on top of their decks. Any player focuses a breach.
flavor text: It's the only thing that smiles more than me. - Lash, Breach Mage Scout

name: Corrupter
effect text:
When this minion suffers damage, the player who dealt that damage gains a corruption and places it on top of their deck.
Persistent: Gravehold suffers 1 damage.
flavor text: The Corrupters are but a shadow of the Crooked Mask, bringing madness to all that have endured its pollution.

name: Tempt
effect text: The player with the most Crystals in hand discards all of their Crystals, suffers 3 damage, and gains a card from any supply pile that costs 4꒔ or less.
flavor text: There is a dust that fills the air when a hole is torn through the wall of the world. For some it is just that, dust. But for others, it warps the mind and grants strange power.

name: Pain Sower
effect text: Persistent: Any player suffers 2 damage. A different player focuses a breach.
flavor text: Even its beasts seem to delight in lunacy. - Brama, Breach Mage Elder

name: Twisting Madness
effect text:
To Discard: Discard four cards in hand and draw one card.
Power 2: Gravehold gains 3 life. Crooked Mask gains 13 life.
flavor text: Is it laughing at us? - Nym, Breach Apprentice

name: Vex
effect text: Discard the top two cards of the nemesis deck. For each tier 3 nemesis card discarded this way, Gravehold suffers 4 damage.
flavor text: It is one thing to swing a sword or beckon flame from the void. But it is another act indeed to fight blinding madness from within. - Brama, Breach Mage Elder

name: Afflict
effect text: Two different players each gain two corruptions and place them on top of their decks. Each of those player gains 1 life.
flavor text: It was as if a whisper echoed behind my eyes, tempting me to stray into the raw abyss, - Xaxos, Breach Mage Adept

name: Bedlam Sage
effect text: Persistent: Gravehold gains 2 life. The player with the most life suffers 3 damage.
flavor text: Employing a complex stratagem against such an unpredictable foe is beyond foolish. Instinct is our only and best weapon. - Mist, Breach Mage Dagger Captain

name: Ruin Priest
effect text: Persistent: Any player discards three non-corruption cards. That player gains three corruptions and places them into their hand.
flavor text: In the dark, there is a light. And in madness, there is reason. - Xaxos, Breach Mage Adept

name: Blind Abandon
effect text: Suffer 1 damage. You may destroy a non-corruption card in hand. Destroy this.
flavor text: Our lives matter not in the end. We are mere fodder to these beings, an inconvenient obstacle, no more. What matters is that we take them with us when we go back to oblivion. - Z'hana, Breach Mage Renegade

name: Contagion
effect text: Suffer 1 damage. Return any card that costs 0꒔ in your discard pile to your hand. Destroy this.
flavor text: The Crooked Mask brings a sickness that spreads, like black wings, across a mage's mind.

name: Delirium Veil
effect text: Gravehold suffers 2 damage. Focus a breach. Destroy this.
flavor text: The Crooked Mask grants a power too vast to be contained.

name: Dire Wisdom
effect text: Gain a spell from any spell supply pile. Gain three corruptions and place them on top of your deck. Destroy this.
flavor text: The Crooked Mask enhances magical abilities even as it scatters the wits.

name: Endless Hunger
effect text: Gravehold suffers 3 damage. Gain 2 life. Destroy this.
flavor text: The Crooked Mask bestows an empty greed that cannot be slaked.

name: Fever of War
effect text: Suffer 1 damage. Deal 2 damage. Destroy this.
flavor text: The Crooked Mask preaches pain as a virtue.

name: Grim Sight
effect text: Gravehold suffers 2 damage. Reveal the top card of your deck. You may destroy it. Destroy this.
flavor text: The Crooked Mask guides all toward oblivion.

name: Insatiable Avarice
effect text: Suffer 2 damage. Gain a gem from the least expensive supply pile and place it into your hand. Destroy this.
flavor text: The Crooked Mask blesses the covetous.

name: Lust for Power
effect text: Suffer 1 damage. Gain 1 charge. Destroy this.
flavor text: The Crooked Mask venerates those who wield destruction.

name: Nothingness
effect text: Discard two non-corruption cards. Suffers 2 damage. Shuffle any player's turn order card into the turn order deck. Destroy this.
flavor text: The Crooked Mask shackles the self.

name: Reckless Might
effect text: Gain a relic from any relic supply pile and place it on top of your deck. Suffer damage equal to half its cost, rounded up. Destroy this.
flavor text: The Crooked Mask consumes our fear of extermination.

name: Gorge
effect text: Devour two cards from the second most expensive gem supply pile. Any player suffers 2 damage.
flavor text: So much of our history was lost in the first Purge. Aeons of knowledge, art, and culture erased. It has been so very long that we know not even the true name of The World That Was. - Brama, Breach Mage Elder

name: Lobotomize
effect text:
Any player suffers 3 damage.
OR
Devour three spells from any spell supply pile.
flavor text: I saw the woman's eyes empty and everything she was fall away into nothing. - Nerva, Survivor

name: Thought Biter
effect text:
Persistent: Any player suffers 2 damage.
OR
Devour two relics from the least expensive relic supply pile.
flavor text: Is it eating the cave wall? - Nym, Breach Apprentice

name: Cerephage
effect text: Persistent: Devour cards equal to this minion's life from one supply pile. Then, this minion suffers 2 damage.
flavor text: Quickly. Before our heads are hollow. - Adelheim, Breach Mage Weaponsmith

name: Godfeeders
effect text: Persistent: Gravehold suffers 3 damage. Devour a gem from the most expensive gem supply pile.
flavor text: The Prince exploits these creatures to both mend its wounds and sate its hunger.

name: Mindguzzler
effect text:
Immediately: Set this minion's life equal to 8 plus the number of empty supply piles.
Persistent: Unleash.

name: Digest
effect text:
Unleash three times.
OR
Any player suffers damage equal to the number of empty supply piles.
flavor text: The Prince feasts on the memories of those left in Gravehold, consuming their very histories.

name: Memory Eater
effect text: Persistent: The player with the lowest life suffers damage equal to the number of empty supply piles.
flavor text: Sometimes I think it a blessing to have forgotten so much of my past. - Phaedraxa, Breach Mage Seer

name: Vile Feast
effect text:
To Discard: Spend 8꒔.
Power 2: Gravehold suffers 2 damage for each empty supply pile.
flavor text: It aims to make us forget what is at stake. - Malastar, Breach Mage Mentor

name: Cleave
effect text: Rageborne Strikes.
flavor text: Thraxir was breach commander for as long as most could remember. To honor him, to this very day no man or woman has been elected to the post in his stead.

name: Provoker
effect text: Persistent: Gravehold suffers damage equal to the number of Fury tokens Rageborne has.
flavor text: I nearly wasted a freshly forged chopper on one of these things. - Reeve, Breach Mage Elite

name: Unrelenting Ire
effect text: Unleash. If there are two nemesis turn order cards in the turn order discard pile, Unleash two additional times.
flavor text: I reckon its head would look good on a post. - Reeve, Breach Mage Elite

name: Blood Cry
effect text:
To Discard: Lose 4 charges.
Power 2: Unleash four times.
flavor text: The cave walls crumble and quake as it bellows to its kin.

name: Invoke Carnage
effect text:
To Discard: Spend 7꒔.
Power 2: Unleash. Any player suffers 1 damage. That player suffers 1 additional damage for each Fury token Rageborne has.
flavor text: There is but a single power among The Nameless that can shatter Gravehold. - Brama, Breach Mage Elder

name: Scorn
effect text:
Persistent: Gravehold suffers 3 damage.
OR
Unleash twice.
flavor text: Part of me almost admires the craftmanship of this horrible thing. - Adelheim, Breach Mage Weaponsmith

name: Avatar of Wrath
effect text: Persistent: Rageborne Strikes.
flavor text: Many a mage found their end in the gullet of this beast.

name: Onslaught
effect text: Unleash three times. The players collectively discard cards in hand equal to the number of Fury tokens Rageborne has.
flavor text: Even its shadow leaves a wake of carnage, smoke, and screams.

name: Rolling Death
effect text:
To Discard: Spend 8꒔.
Power 2: Rageborne Strikes twice.
flavor text: Its breath rasped as it turned the black rocks red. And those who could, ran. - Nerva, Survivor

name: Convoke
effect text: Any player suffers 4 damage.
flavor text: No other thing, in our world or theirs, has been so violent as this beast. - Brama, Breach Mage Elder

name: Devastate
effect text: Gravehold suffers 5 damage.
flavor text: Anger is born in fire. - Z'hana, Breach Mage Renegade

name: Eviscerate
effect text: The player with the lowest life suffers 2 damage.
flavor text: The breach commander Thraxir was split in twain with a single blow, his armor twisted and glowing like a brand. I have never seen such a thing before or since. - Mist, Breach Mage Dagger Captain

name: Frenzy
effect text: The player with the most opened breaches suffers 3 damage.
flavor text: All great armies have a warrior that is feared above all others. We call theirs Rageborne. - Mist, Breach Mage Dagger Captain

name: Raze
effect text: Gravehold suffers 3 damage. Any player suffers 1 damage.
flavor text: The fire spread from the old barracks to the south wall in a moment, the ancient stone hissing and turning black as the beast strode through the city. - Nerva, Survivor

name: Seize
effect text: The players collectively discard the two most expensive prepped spells.
flavor text: How this cave has not long ago collapsed is a wonder and a mercy. - Nerva, Survivor

name: Turn Reminder
effect text:
Player Turn
Casting Phase
You may Cast any of your prepped spells in opened breaches. You must Cast any of your prepped spells in closed breaches. Place cast spells on top of your discard pile as they are cast.
Main Phase
You may resolve the following actions in any order and as many times as you want:
• Play a gem or relic card
• Gain a card
• Gain a charge
• Focus a breach
• Open a breach
• Prep a spell to a breach
• Resolve a "While prepped" effect
• Resolve a "To Discard" effect
Draw Phase Place all the gems and relics that you have played this turn on top of your discard pile in any order you choose. Draw cards from the top of your deck until you have five cards in your hand.
Nemesis Turn
Main Phase
From oldest to newest, resolve the effect of each power card and the Persistent: effect of each minion card the nemesis has in play.
Draw Phase
Draw a card from the nemesis deck.
• If it is an attack card: Resolve its effect immediately.
• If it is a minion card or a power card:
Place it into play with the appropriate number of life or power tokens.
Resolve any effects following "Immediately:" on the card.
The rest of its effects will not be resolve this turn.
When Exhausted
• Unleash twice.
• Destroy one of your breaches.
• Discard all of your charge tokens.
• Deal excess damage (x2) to Gravehold.

effect text: Gain 3꒔. You may discard a card in hand. If you do, any ally draws a card.

name: Clouded Sapphire
effect text: Gain 3꒔. If this is the first time you have played Clouded Sapphire this turn, any ally gains 1 charge.

name: Diamond Cluster
effect text: Gain 2꒔. If this is the second time you have played Diamond Cluster this turn, gain an additional 2꒔.

name: Jade
effect text: Gain 2꒔.

name: Searing Ruby
effect text: Gain 2꒔. Gain an additional 1꒔ that can only be used to gain a spell.

name: Sifter's Pearl
effect text: Gain 2꒔. Each player reveals the top card of their deck and either discards it or returns it to the top of their deck.

name: V'riswood Amber
effect text:
When you gain this, you may place it on top of your deck.
Gain 2 ꒔.

name: Blasting Staff
effect text: You may cast a prepped spell that you prepped this turn. If you do, that spell deals 2 additional damage.

name: Cairn Compass
effect text: Any ally may prep a spell in their discard pile to their opened or closed breach(es).

name: Bottled Vortex
effect text: Destroy this. Destroy up to two cards in your hand or discard pile. Draw a card.

name: Flexing Dagger
effect text:
The next time you focus or open a breach this turn, it costs 3꒔ less.
OR
Destroy this. Deal 1 damage.

name: Focusing Orb
effect text:
Focus any player's breach.
OR
Destroy this. Gravehold gains 3 life.

name: Mage's Talisman
effect text: Gain 1 charge. Any ally gains 1 charge.

name: Unstable Prism
effect text:
Play a gem in hand twice and destroy it.
OR
Gain 2꒔.

name: Amplify Vision
effect text: Cast: Focus your closed breach with the lowest focus cost. Deal 2 damage. If all of your breaches are opened, deal 1 additional damage.

name: Arcane Nexus
effect text:
While prepped, once per turn during your main phase you may return a gem you played this turn to your hand.
Cast: Deal 4 damage.

name: Chaos Arc
effect text: Cast: Deal 3 damage. Deal 2 additional damage for each prepped spell in an adjacent breach.

name: Consuming Void
effect text: Cast: Destroy up to two cards in hand. Deal 3 damage for each card destroyed in this way.

name: Dark Fire
effect text: Cast: Discard up to two cards in hand. Deal 3 damage for each card discarded this way.

name: Essence Theft
effect text: Cast: Deal 3 damage. You may discard a card in hand. If you do, any player gains 1 life.

name: Feral Lightning
effect text:
This spell may be prepped to a closed breach without focusing it.
Cast: Deal 3 damage.

name: Ignite
effect text: Cast: Deal 2 damage. Any ally gains 1 charge.

name: Lava Tendril
effect text:
While prepped, at the end of your casting phase, deal 1 damage.
Cast: Deal 3 damage.

name: Oblivion Swell
effect text:
While prepped, once per turn during your main phase, you may gain 1꒔.
Cast: Deal 2 damage. You may discard a gem. If you do, deal additional damage equal to its cost.

name: Phoenix Flame
effect text: Cast: Deal 2 damage. You may lose 1 charge to deal 2 additional damage.

name: Planar Insight
effect text: Cast: Deal 2 damage. Deal 1 additional damage for each of your opened breaches.

name: Spectral Echo
effect text: Cast: Deal 2 damage. You may destroy a card in hand.

name: Wildfire Whip
effect text:
While prepped, during your main phase, you may spend 2꒔ to cast any player's prepped spell.
Cast: Deal 4 damage.

name: Transmogrifier
effect text: Destroy a card in hand. You may gain a card from any supply pile that costs up to 3꒔ more than the destroyed card.

name: Vim Dynamo
effect text:
Suffer 1 damage. Any player draws two cards.
OR
Destroy this. Any player gains 2 life and 1 charge.

name: Combustion
effect text:
Cast: Deal 2 damage to a minion. Deal 2 damage to a different minion or the nemesis.
(Effects that modify damage affect both instances of damage this spell deals.)

name: Devouring Shadow
effect text:
While prepped, once per turn during your main phase, you may destroy a card in hand.
Cast: Deal 3 damage.

name: Disintegrating Scythe
effect text: Cast: Deal 8 damage. Suffer 1 damage. Instead of discarding this, destroy it or place it on top of any player's discard pile.

name: Monstrous Inferno
effect text:
This spell must be prepped to two adjacent breaches so that this card touches both breaches. This fully occupies both breaches.
Cast: Deal 7 damage divided however you choose to the nemesis and any number of minions.

name: Void Bond
effect text: Cast: Deal 3 damage. You may cast any player's prepped spell.

name: Leeching Agate
effect text:
When you gain this, gain 1 charge.
Gain 2꒔.

name: Molten Hammer
effect text: Gain 1 charge. You may destroy a card in hand or on top of any player's discard pile.

name: Temporal Helix
effect text: Cast any player's prepped spell without discarding it.

name: Blaze
effect text:
When you gain this, you may place it on top of any player's discard pile.
Cast: Deal 2 damage. Deal 1 additional damage for each other time you have cast Blaze this turn and for each other Blaze you currently have prepped.

name: Radiance
effect text: Cast: Deal 5 damage. Each ally draws a card.

name: Sage's Brand
effect text:
This spell must be prepped to two adjacent breaches so that this card touches both breaches. This fully occupies both breaches. While prepped, draw an additional card during your draw phase.
Cast: Deal 6 damage.

name: Scrying Bolt
effect text: Cast: Deal 5 damage. You may lose 1 charge. If you do, reveal the top two cards of the nemesis deck. Return them in any order.

name: Immolate
effect text:
While prepped, when you suffer 1 damage, gain 1 charge.
Cast: Deal 1 damage.
flavor text: His charge is two-fold: to guide his former students as needed and to train the younglings that will fight for Gravehold when the others fall.

flavor text: Just outside the city walls there are men and women, frozen in green horror, like monuments to the Blight Lord's coming. - Z'hana, Breach Mage Renegade

name: Shard Spitter
effect text: Persistent: Gravehold suffers 2 damage. Any player gains a Tainted Jade and places it on top of their deck.
flavor text: Renny Mumbast lost both eyes to these wretched things. So now, when the warning bells sound the Blight Lord's call, we wear goggles. - Mist, Breach Mage Dagger Captain

name: Vitrify

flavor text: The elders of Gravehold thought it wise to pave the streets of the dirt market in tumbled breach glass.

effect text:

Power 2: Advance the Tainted Track twice.
flavor text: If it just touches your arm, count yourself lucky. Just chop the limb off before it's too late. - Reeve, Breach Mage Elite

name: Ossify
effect text: The players collectively gain three Tainted Jades and place them on top of their decks.
flavor text: The Blight Lord's touch is enough to crystallize anything, living or otherwise.

name: Verdigra
effect text: Persistent: Any player suffers 3 damage. If this minion has 8 or less life, advance the Tainted Track.
flavor text: It's great that they shatter so easily, but not so much when they explode. - Lash, Breach Mage Scout

effect text:

effect text:

name: Blinking Terror
effect text:
This minion is aligned to III.
Persistent: Any player loses 1 charge or suffers 2 damage.
flavor text: The Wayward One is a shepherd of sorts, guiding an army of lost horrors.

name: Irradiate
effect text: Any player suffers 2 damage. Any player discards a misaligned prepped spell.
flavor text: After the Wayward One had wandered back through the breach, the survivors of Gravehold were afflicted with strange maladies. One poor boy seemed to shift out of the world, only to return, screaming, hours later.

name: Quantum Maze
effect text: Power 2: If any player has an aligned spell, a player with an aligned spell suffers 5 damage.
flavor text: It is the Void and everything within it. - Brama, Breach Mage Elder

name: Feedback Coil
effect text:
To Discard: Spend 7꒔.
Power 2: The player with the most misaligned prepped spells suffers 3 damage and discards two cards.
flavor text: It seems trapped between their world and ours, not quite belonging to either. - Xaxos, Breach Mage Adept

name: Fractured Nebula
effect text: Power 2: Shift Wayward One to IV. Gravehold suffers 8 damage. The players may collectively discard up to 2 aligned spells. For each spell discarded this way, prevent 4 of that damage.
flavor text: Within its twisted form, I saw the ragged teeth of infinity. - Xaxos, Breach Mage Adept

name: Warper
effect text: This minion is aligned to IV. When a player deals damage, that player must deal damage to this minion.
flavor text: How is this thing still alive? - Nym, Breach Apprentice

name: Aether Flux
effect text: Power 2: If any player has two or more misaligned spells, a player with or more misaligned prepped spells suffers 7 damage.
flavor text: It is a being lost in agony as much as it is a monster. - Xaxos, Breach Mage Adept

name: Netherspawn
effect text:
This minion is aligned to II. Prevent all damage dealt to Wayward One.

name: Shunt
effect text:

OR

effect text:

effect text:

OR

flavor text: They wait until we slumber, slithering through the caves without a sound. - Ohat, Dirt Merchant

flavor text: In The World That Was, there were myths of ancients, now lost to us, that walked the primordial wastes. They built Gravehold as a sanctuary from the chaos. The elders called them troggs.

flavor text: They're rather making a mess of this home they want so badly. - Lash, Breach Mage Scout

name: Servitude to Evil
effect text:
To Discard: Spend 7꒔.

flavor text: One need only look in their hollow eyes to know their aim. - Adelheim, Breach Mage Weaponsmith

name: Besiege
effect text: Unleash twice. If there are three or fewer troggs in play, Unleash again until there are four troggs in play.
flavor text: The Horde-Crone has stirred the lost tribes from the bones of memory with a new, single-minded purpose: to reclaim Gravehold.

flavor text: The Troggs wandered the caves for aeons. Deep within the rock and shadow, they found their deity sleeping.

name: Afflict
effect text: Unleash. Any player suffers 3 damage and may place a card in their discard pile into their hand.
flavor text: Such wisdom comes at a considerable price. - Xaxos, Voidbringer

name: Catacomb Drone
effect text: Persistent: Unleash. Gravehold suffers 1 damage.
flavor text: Kadir remains convinced the drones were once merely creatures from The Depths.

name: Encroach
effect text: Unleash. Reveal the top card of the turn order deck. If a player turn order card was revealed, that player suffers 2 damage. Otherwise, Gravehold suffers 3 damage.

name: Heart of Nothing
effect text:
To Discard: Discard four cards in hand.
Power 2: Unleash twice.
OR
Any player suffers 4 damage.
flavor text: Beyond our world is a vast nothing. At the center of this lies The Nameless. - Mist, Voidwalker

name: Howling Spinners
effect text: Persistent: Any player suffers 2 damage.
flavor text: The sound they make as they weave echoes through the cave is like the otherworldly throes of our lost companions. - Gex, Breach Mage Advisor

name: Night Unending
effect text: Power 3: Gravehold suffers 2 damage for each spell prepped by the player with the most prepped spells.
flavor text: Here beneath The World That Was there is no day, no time really, just night unending. - Xaxos, Voidbringer

name: Nix
effect text: Unleash. Any player suffers 1 damage and discards their most expensive card in hand.
flavor text: It's as if the world itself is screaming. - Nerva, Survivor

name: Planar Collision
effect text:
To Discard: Discard two prepped spells.
Power 2: Unleash twice.
flavor text: None remembered the true name of The World That Was until Yan Magda spoke it aloud: Khasad Vol.

name: Thrash
effect text: Unleash. The players collectively discard two cards in hand.
flavor text: The creature thrashed as it burned, its massive body collapsing into the South Wall like a hot blade through cloth. - Garu, Oathsworn Keeper

name: Aphotic Sun
effect text:
To Discard: Spend 7꒔.
Power 2: Unleash. The player with the most charges suffers 3 damage and loses all of their charges.
flavor text: The harsh light of the dead star burned away the dark as it crept through the breach. Amd around it I saw ravaged worlds The Nameless had already claimed. - Indira, Breach Apprentice

name: Chaos Flail
effect text:
To Discard: Spend 7꒔.
Power 2: Unleash twice. Any player places their discard pile on top of their deck and shuffles it. Then, that player reveals the top two cards of their deck and destroys the most expensive card revealed.

name: Mage Ender
effect text: Persistent: The player with the most opened breaches suffers 2 damage.
flavor text: It sneered as it lunged at us, an awful maw of jagged teeth eager to end one of us, if not all. - Ohat, Dirt Merchant

name: Mangleroot
effect text: Persistent: Gravehold suffers 3 damage. This minion suffers 2 damage.
flavor text: One of the few indigenous creatures of the cave, though corrupted from exposure to the breach. - Gex, Breach Mage Advisor

name: Morbid Gyre
effect text:
To Discard: Spend 7꒔.
Power 1: Unleash twice. The players collectively discard three cards in hand.
flavor text: It churned and roiled, a maelstrom of malign power. The void was upon me and yet I felt only the throes of freedom from my prison of sleep. - Yan Magda, Enlightened Exile

name: Mutilate
effect text: Unleash. The players collectively discard two prepped spells. Any player suffers 2 damage.
flavor text: They say that before The Nameless found Gravehold, nothing grew in these caves. It appears the cave burgeons through our blood. - Gex, Breach Mage Advisor

name: Null Scion
effect text: Persistent: Unleash.
flavor text: Quilius's first blow glanced off its carapace like breach, but her second blow carved it in twain. - Dezmodia, Voidborn Prodigy

name: Smite
effect text: Unleash twice. Gravehold suffers 2 damage.
flavor text: One side of this struggle must fall for the other to truly live. - Xaxos, Voidbringer

name: Apocalypse Ritual
effect text:
To Discard: Spend 8꒔.
Power 2: Gravehold suffers 5 damage for each nemesis turn order card in the turn order discard pile.

name: Banish
effect text: Unleash twice. The player with the most prepped spells suffers 1 damage for each for their prepped spells.
flavor text: Get down! It's ejecting back at us! - Ohat, Dirt Merchant

name: Cataclysmic Fate
effect text:
To Discard: Destroy a prepped spell that costs 5꒔ or more and a breach in which it was prepped.
Power 1: The player with the lowest life suffers 4 damage.

name: Monstrosity of Omens
effect text:
When damage is dealt to this minion, reduce that damage to 1.
Persistent: Gravehold suffers damage equal to this minion's current life.
flavor text: Never have I seen such a creature, even among the ranks of The Nameless. - Yan Magda, Enlightened Exile

name: Engulf
effect text: Resolve the most recently discarded attack card in the nemesis discard pile.
flavor text: The Nameless rarely attack in the same fashion twice. It would seem today is an exception. - Dezmodia, Voidborn Prodigy

name: Quell
effect text:
Gravehold suffers 7 damage.
OR
Unleash three times.
flavor text: The Nameless hunger for the same thing we do: an end to this war. - Garu, Oathsworn Protector

name: Throttle
effect text: Unleash twice. Any player destroys their three most expensive cards in hand.
flavor text: Were I made of muscle and blood like the others, the impact would have surely ended me. - Remnant, Aetherial Entity

name: Withering Beam
effect text: Power 2: Unleash twice. The players collectively destroy the two most expensive prepped spells.
flavor text: I watched a fellow merchant atrophy and fall to the ground in ash as the beam hit his cart. - Ohat, Dirt Merchant

name: Deep Abomination
effect text: Persistent: Each Player suffers 1 damage for each turn order card that player has in the turn order discard pile.
flavor text: It is said that each abomination is but the same creature from across all worlds twisted into a single form.

name: Hasten
effect text: Any player suffers damage equal to the number of nemesis tokens Gate Witch has. Unleash. Place this card on the bottom of the nemesis deck.
flavor text: Time is The Witch's domain, the one thing we have so little left. - Gex, Breach Mage Adviser

name: Temporal Nimbus
effect text:
To Discard: Spend 6꒔.
Power 3: Unleash. Gate Witch draws an additional card during the nemesis draw phase this turn.

name: Nether Spiral
effect text:
To Discard: Spend 7꒔.
Power 3: Choose any player's turn order card in the turn order discard pile. Shuffle the rest of the turn order cards into the turn order deck.
flavor text: Within the void, there are infinite spirals of worlds. Some are unborn, others are thriving. But there is a dead light in some that have been claimed by The Nameless. - Yan Magda, Enlightened Exile

name: Paradox Beast
effect text: Persistent: Gravehold suffers damage equal to the number of nemesis tokens Gate Witch has.
flavor text: It moves between time and space, too quick for the eye and harder yet to strike. - Remnant, Aethereal Entity

name: Portal Wretch
effect text:
When this minion is discarded from play, shuffle a nemesis turn order card into the turn order deck.
Persistent: The player with the most charges suffers 2 damage.

name: Distort
effect text: Unleash. Reveal the top card of the turn order deck. If a player turn order card is revealed, discard it. Otherwise, Gravehold suffers 5 damage. Place this card on the bottom of the nemesis deck.
flavor text: Being pushed out of time is a painful ordeal even for me. - Remnant, Aethereal Entity

name: Infinite Enmity
effect text:
To Discard: Spend 8꒔.
Power 2: Unleash until Gate Witch has six nemesis tokens. Place this card on the bottom of the nemesis deck.
flavor text: Countless times we have won. And countless more we have lost. - Mazahaedron, Henge Mystic

name: Rift Scourge
effect text:
When this minion is discarded from play or the nemesis deck, place it on the bottom of the nemesis deck.
Persistent: Any player suffers 4 damage.
flavor text: It lives outside of time and therefore cannot be slain. - Garu, Oathsworn Protector

name: Beseech
effect text: Place the acolyte in play with the lowest life on the bottom of the acolyte deck. Draw an acolyte. Unleash.
flavor text: The Hollow Crown gestured to the acolyte, who removed its mask and walked into the blinding light within the breach.

name: Enslave
effect text: Resolve the Blood Magic effect of each acolyte in play without those acolytes suffering damage from their Blood Magic effects.
flavor text: It has but one weapon: blind obedience.

name: Thronewatch
effect text: Persistent: Resolve the Blood Magic effect of the acolyte with the lowest life. That acolyte suffers 1 additional damage.

name: Ascend
effect text: Unleash. The acolyte with the lowest life gains 10 life. Resolve that acolyte's Blood Magic effect.
flavor text: Perhaps it is not our doom, Brama. Perhaps it is our very maker. - Xaxos, Voidbringer

name: Infernal Domain
effect text:
To Discard: Spend 8꒔.
Power 2: Draw an acolyte. Resolve the Blood Magic effect of each acolute in play without those acolytes suffering damage from their Blood Magic effects.

name: Reign
effect text: Resolve the Blood Magic effect of the acolyte with the most life. That acolyte suffers 6 additional damage. Unleash twice.
flavor text: As it passed through the city, men and women dropped to their knees faithfully, their eyes heavy with tears of awe.

name: Dominate
effect text: Resolve the Blood Magic effect of each acolyte in play without those acolytes suffering damage from their Blood Magic effects. Repeat this one additional time.
flavor text: Behind their masks is nothing, youngling. They have made their choice. - Gex, Breach Mage Adviser

name: Nameless Faith
effect text:
To Discard: Spend 8꒔.
Power 1: Shuffle the two most recently discarded acolytes in the acolyte discard into the acolyte deck. Resolve the Blood Magic effect of each acolyte in play without those acolytes suffering damage from their Blood Magic effects.

name: Viscera Bride
effect text: Persistent: The acolyte with the lowest life gains 10 life. Resolve that acolyte's Blood Magic effect twice.
flavor text: All kings must have a queen. - Dezmodia, Voidborn Prodigy

name: Bezu
effect text: Gravehold and this minion suffer 1 damage for each spell prepped by the player with the most prepped spells.
flavor text: We find wisdom in their great cruelty

name: Edryss Tragg
effect text: Any player suffers 2 damage. Then, if that player has 5 life or less, this minion suffers 2 damage.
flavor text: We become that which is most feared.

name: Holadran
effect text: Two different players each suffer 1 damage.
flavor text: We renounce our existence behind each mask.

name: Kurgax
effect text: Gravehold suffers 1 damage. Any player suffers 1 damage.
flavor text: We hunger to be nothing.

name: Lurzan
effect text: The player with the lowest life suffers 1 damage.
flavor text: We cull the weak to feed the worthy.

name: Mord
effect text:
Gravehold suffers 3 damage.
OR
Any player loses 1 charge, Gravehold suffers 1 damage, and this minion suffers 1 damage.
flavor text: We wipe the sister-words from our tongues to taste oblivion.

name: Nhavkalas
effect text: Gravehold suffers 3 damage. This minion suffers 1 damage.
flavor text: We cast aside the haven that has become our shackle.

name: Ren-Goda
effect text:
Any player suffers 2 damage.
OR
Any player suffers 1 damage and discards their most expensive card in hand.
flavor text: We honor the void in blood.

name: Solara
effect text: Any player discards 2 cards in hand. This minion suffers 3 damage.
flavor text: We wield the breach in reverance to those from beyond it.

name: Dusk Spawn
effect text:
When this minion is dealt damage, Magus of Cleaks gains one nemesis token.
Persistent: Any player loses 1 charge or suffers 2 damage.
flavor text: It is shadow, given form and cruelty. - Mazahaedron, Henge Mystic

name: Rising Dark
effect text:
When Magus of Cloaks is dealt damage, discard this.
Power 3: Unleash. Any player suffers 3 damage. Any player destroys a prepped spell that costs 0꒔.
flavor text: Worlds are born and die in dark. - Yan Magda, Enlightened Exile

name: Twilight Empire
effect text: Power 3: Gravehold suffers damage equal to the number of nemesis tokens Magus of Cloaks has. Then, Magus of Cloaks gains one nemesis token.

name: Ashen Haruspex
effect text:
When this minion is dealt damage, prevent 2 of that damage.
Persistent: Any player suffers damage equal to half the number of nemesis tokens Magus of Cloaks has, rounded up.
flavor text: If any among us can kill the dark itself, it is Quilius. - Garu, Oathsworn Protector

name: Black Solstice
effect text:
When Magus of Cloaks is dealt damage, discard this.
Power 2: Unleash twice. Any player suffers 3 damage and discards a prepped spell.
flavor text: I could not tell if Ulgimor was afraid or simply angry. Can a shadow feel such things? - Ohat, Dirt Merchant

name: Enshroud
effect text: Magus of Cloaks gains four nemesis tokens. The players collectively destroy two prepped spells that cost 0꒔.
flavor text: The shadows rose and swallowed what little light there was. - Ohat, Dirt Merchant

name: Eclipse
effect text: Magus of Cloaks gains five nemesis tokens. The player with the most expensive prepped spell destroys that spell and suffers 2 damage.
flavor text: We live in darkness, but they thrive in it. - Mist, Voidwalker

name: Shadow's Reach
effect text:
Immediately: Magus of Cloaks gains four nemesis tokens.
Power 9: Magus of Cloaks reaches its final form. Humanity is wiped out. The players lose the game.
flavor text: What little light we have shall be smothered in the end. - Nerva, Survivor

name: Veil Daughter
effect text:
When this minion is dealt damage, reduce that damage by the number of nemesis tokens Magus of Cloaks has.
Persistent: The player with the most charges suffers 4 damage.
flavor text: Where Ulgimor is merely a beast of shadow, the Veil Daughter is a darkling goddess. - Dezmodia, Voidborn Prodigy

name: Cryptid
effect text:
Persistent: The player with the most expensive prepped spell discards that spell.
OR
Umbra Titan loses one nemesis token.
flavor text: The beasts of this cave seem to revere The Titan as though it were some ancient god. - Mazahaedron, Henge Mystic

name: Grubber
effect text: Persistent: If the nemesis has two turn order cards in the turn order discard pile, Umbra Titan loses one nemesis token. Otherwise, Gravehold suffers 2 damage.
flavor text: Kick it, stab it, burn it... the thing just keeps grinning. - Sparrow, Breach Mage Soldier

name: Seismic Roar
effect text:
To Discard: Spend 6꒔.
Power 3: Umbra Titan loses two nemesis tokens.
flavor text: I roared as it bore through the rock. And Gravehold shuddered like those within its walls. - Nerva, Survivor

name: Maul
effect text:
The players collectively destroy the two most expensive prepped spells.
OR
Umbra Titan loses two nemesis tokens.

name: Tombfright
effect text: Persistent: If Umbra Titan has 5 or more nemesis tokens, it loses a nemesis token. Otherwise, Gravehold suffers 3 damage.
flavor text: With two heads, it's twice as eager to make a meal of a mage. - Sparrow, Breach Mage Soldier

name: Vault Behemoth
effect text: Persistent: Any player suffers 2 damage. If this minion has 8 or less life, Umbra Titan loses one nemesis token.
flavor text: The air rasping in its massive lungs is enough to burst your eardrums.

name: Crumble
effect text:
Umbra Titan loses three nemesis tokens.
OR
Unleash. Place the most recently discarded minion in the nemesis discard pile back into play.

name: Demi-Ancient
effect text: Persistent: Umbra Titan loses one nemesis token.
flavor text: In the time before ours, their kind thrived in the tumult of the fledgling world. Now, they seek a new home among The Nameless. - Mazahaedron, Henge Mystic

name: Yawning Black
effect text:
To Discard: Spend 8꒔.
Power 2: Any player suffers 6 damage.
OR
Umbra Titan loses three nemesis tokens.
flavor text: The Titan hides beneath the skin of the cave, emerging only to strike.

name: Turn Reminder
effect text:
Player Turn
Casting Phase
You may Cast any of your prepped spells in opened breaches. You must Cast any of your prepped spells in closed breaches. Place cast spells on top of your discard pile as they are cast.
Main Phase
You may resolve the following actions in any order and as many times as you want:
• Play a gem or relic card
• Gain a card
• Gain a charge
• Focus a breach
• Open a breach
• Prep a spell to a breach
• Resolve a "While prepped" effect
• Resolve a "To Discard" effect
Draw Phase Place all the gems and relics that you have played this turn on top of your discard pile in any order you choose. Draw cards from the top of your deck until you have five cards in your hand.
Nemesis Turn
Main Phase
From oldest to newest, resolve the effect of each power card and the Persistent: effect of each minion card the nemesis has in play.
Draw Phase
Draw a card from the nemesis deck.
• If it is an attack card: Resolve its effect immediately.
• If it is a minion card or a power card:
Place it into play with the appropriate number of life or power tokens.
Resolve any effects following "Immediately:" on the card.
The rest of its effects will not be resolve this turn.
When Exhausted
• Unleash twice.
• Destroy one of your breaches.
• Discard all of your charge tokens.
• Deal excess damage (x2) to Gravehold.

name: March on Gravehold
effect text:
To Discard: Lose 4 charges.
Power 2: If Knight of Shackles's breach I is open, any player suffers 4 damage. Otherwise, Unleash twice.

name: Siege
effect text: Unleash twice. Any player focuses their breach III.
flavor text: Only a breach mage would know Gravehold so well. - Gex, Breach Mage Adviser

name: Chainsworn
effect text:
Immediately: Knight of Shackles focuses its breach III.
Persistent: Any player suffers 1 damage. That player suffers 1 additional damage for each opened breach Knight of Shackles has.
flavor text: It strode confidently among the dead upon its blighted steed, the glow of the breach radiating from it as they sieged the city.

name: Engine of War
effect text:
To Discard: Discard three prepped spells.
Power 2: Any player suffers 1 damage. That player suffers 2 additional damage for each opened breach Knight of Shackles has. Unleash.
flavor text: If Thraxir can become one of them, so can I. - Xaxos, Voidbringer

name: Rout
effect text: If Knight of Shackles's breach Ⅰ is open, Gravehold suffers 6 damage. Otherwise, Knight of Shackles opens its breach I.
flavor text: Mist refuses to see Thraxir within this thing, but it's quite clear to the rest of us. - Gex, Breach Mage Adviser

name: Deathless Legion
effect text:
Players cannot rotate Knight of Shackles's breaches.
Persistent: Gravehold suffers 1 damage. Gravehold suffers 1 additional damage for each opened breach Knight of Shackles has.

name: End of All
effect text:
To Discard: Destroy three cards in hand that each cost 3꒔ or more.
Power 2: Knight of Shackles opens its closed breach with the lowest focus cost.
flavor text: Thraxir was once a breach mage commander, torn asunder by the one called Rageborne. Now he is a harbinger for The Nameless, the end of all.

name: Invade
effect text: If Knight of Shackles's breach Ⅱ is closed, Knight of Shackles opens that breach. Otherwise, for each opened breach Knight of Shackles has, place the most recently discarded power card into player with the number of power tokens indicated on the card.

name: Aether Barb
effect text: Power 2: Unleash. The players collectively discard cards in hand equal to the number of cards in the Thorn supply pile. Advance.
flavor text: It was as if a splinter was driven into my brain. And the words necessary to fight back were all but lost to me. - Indira, Breach Apprentice

name: Nettlewind
effect text: Persistent: If the Thorn supply pile is a spell, Advance. Otherwise, Gravehold suffers 2 damage.

name: Stop E Front
effect text: This deck is the front of Evolve deck. Do not open this until instructed to do so.

name: Leviathan Egg Story
effect text:
The large egg begins to crack open, and a scaly hand bursts through the membrane. The creature claws its way out of the massive shell, its long, sharp teeth glistening. It won't take long for it to find its next meal.
Banish Leviathan Egg. Place card E03 into play with the same number of life tokens on it that Leviathan Egg had before transforming. Do not resolve this minion's Immediately effect this game. Do not resolve this minions Persistent effect this turn.
Do not read any more cards in this deck until instructed to do so.

name: Leviathan Hatchling
effect text:
Immediately: If this is Chapter 4 or higher, Evolve.
Persistent: Gravehold suffers 1 damage.
When you evolve this card, read card E18.

name: Hunted Story
effect text:
As the Nameless strikes you, a strange brand appears burned into your skin. Your chest tightens and you can't breathe. You know the Nameless aren't finish with you.
Banish Hunted. Place card E05 into the nemesis discard pile. The player who suffered damage from Hunted writes their name on E05.
Do not read any more cards in this deck until instructed to do so.

name: Marked
effect text:
Unleash twice.
________________ suffers 3 damage.

name: A Rush of Power
effect text:
A massive breach opens and a swarm of metallic bugs surrounds you. You can feel the power of the newly opened breach surge through you.
Open Insight 3 and apply all rulebook stickers to the rulebook.
Apply a Fourth Breach sticker to the upper right-hand corner of each player's playmat.
Open Box A.
Give each player a Ⅳ breach. Each player places it to the right of their Ⅲ breach with the opened side face up. (During setup of all other games, Ⅳ breaches will start the game closed.)
Do not read any more cards in this deck until instructed to do so.

name: Newly Found Power
effect text:
At the end of your training, you can feel the power growing inside of you.
Mist reassures you, "You have proven yourself quite capable, and have been there to defend the survivors of Gravehold when they need you. I believe you're ready to take the next step... to open your final breach."
Open Insight 3 and apply all rulebook stickers to the rulebook.
Apply a Fourth Breach sticker to the upper right-hand corner of each player's playmat.
Open Box A. Give each player a Ⅳ breach.
Continue reading the front of L17.
Do not read any more cards in this deck until instructed to do so.

name: Ambush Story
effect text:
Fungal Mesh seems more powerful, more volatile, than previous Nameless, as if it is drawing from unstable breach magic. You fear future Nameless will adapt as well.
Banish Ambush. Place card E09 into the nemesis discard pile.
Do not read any more cards in this deck until instructed to do so.

name: Waylay
effect text: Unleash twice. Gravehold suffers 1 damage for each player turn order card in the turn order discard pile.

name: Electric Pod Appears
effect text:
An Electric Pod surges into your vision, sizzling with power. You sense it overflowing with energy. It ignores you completely, hunting the survivors you brought with you.
Place this card next to Elecetric Pod.
When Electric Pod is discard, read the back of this card.
Do not read any more cards in this deck until instructed to do so.
The survivors in your care are clearly relieved as the Electric Pod crumbles into the ground, its essence no longer bound. You're able to harness a bit of its dissipating energy. The player who discard Electric Pod gains 2 charges.
Return this card to the evolve deck.

name: Marked for Extermination
effect text:
The Spawning Horror senses which of you is at your weakest, and does its best to seperate you from the group. You can feel it stalking you, moving in for the kill.
Place this card next to the player with the lowest life. Return this to the evolve deck when the game ends.
Do not read any more cards in this deck until instructed to do so.

name: Annihilate Story
effect text:
Your resistance to the Nameless's mental attacks have drawn their attention to you. If you had simply succumbed, they would have moved on. Now, they fear your power and have marked you as a prime taret for eradication.
Banish Annihilate. Place card E13 into the nemesis discard pile. The player who just discarded cards because of Annihilate writes their name on E13.
Do not read any more cards in this deck until instructed to do so.

name: Eradicate
effect text:
Unleash twice.
_______________ discards their three most expensive cards in hand.

name: Maddening Spectre Story
effect text:
The Spectre has learned from watching your battles, adapting its body and skills in ways to better deflect your attacks, turning it into an even greater threat.
Banish Maddening Spectre. Place card E15 into play with the same number of life and shield tokens on it that MAddening Specre had before transforming. Do not resolve this minion's Persistent effect this turn.
Do not read any more cards in this deck until instructed to do so.

name: Maddening Eidolon
effect text: Persistent: Unleash twice.

name: Spine Harvester Story
effect text:
Death has not stopped the Spine Harvester, it has only filled it with a need for vengeance. Its time in the dark has strengthened it, sharpening its bones and increaasing its bloodlust.
Banish Spine Harvester. Place card E17 into play with the same number of life and shield tokens on it that Spine HArvester had before transitioning. Do not resolve this minion's Persistent effect this turn.
Do not read any more cards in this deck until instructed to do so.

name: Spine Thresher
effect text:
Persisten: Unleah. Any player suffers 1 damage. Evolve.

name: Leviathan Hatchling Story
effect text:
The hatchling has been feeding, finding no shortage of sustenance during this time of war. It has stored the energy it needs to grow, sprouting wings and massive teeth.
Banish Leviathan Hatchling. Place card E19 into play with the same number of life tokens on it that Leviathan Hatchling had before transforming. Do not resolve this minion's Persistent effect this turn.
Do not read any more cards in this deck until instructed to do so.

name: Ravenous Leviathan
effect text:

name: Caustic Larva Story
effect text:
The larvae have burroed deep underground, infecting your camp from below. In the protected darkness, they forget a toxic coccon for themselves, contaminating the air, spreading its sickness to New Gravehold.
Banish Caustic Larva. Place card E21 into play with the same number of life tokens on it that Caustic Larva had before transforming. Do not resolve this minion's Persistent effect this turn.Do not read any more cards in this deck until instructed to do so.

name: Caustic Cocoon
effect text:
Persistent: Unleash. Gravehold suffers 1 damage. Evolve.
If you can't place an evolve sticker, read card E40.

name: Sap Story
effect text:
Unsatiated, the Nameless has been searching for additional power. Finally, it has found the strength it needs in the nearby breach. Satisfied, it hunts you with renewed vigor.

name: Facet Ogre Story
effect text:
The Ogre becomes enraged in the face of your assault, brushing off your attacks as its madness boils over. The Ogre knows it is wounded and, as a last act, will destroy the very ground upon which you stand.
Banish Facet Ogre. Place card E27 into play with the same number of life and shield tokens on it that Facet Ogre had before transforming. Do not resolve this minion's Persistent effect this turn.

name: Suffocate Story
effect text:
The Nameless has sent its minions on a mission to raze New Gravehold. You had a difficult choice: stop the minions and save New Gravehold, or prevent the Nameless from recovering and gaining even more power.
Banish Suffocate. Place card E29 in the nemesis discard pile.

name: Endless Chasm Story
effect text:
The Nameless's greed is a bottomless chasm and it will take verything you have if not stopped.
Enraged by your refusal to appease its demands, the eye of the Nameless narrows onto you.

name: Ravenous Leviathan Story
effect text:
The Leviathan has been feeding from the breach, becoming smarter and quicker, growing in size and in hunger. Its body is sleeker now, allowing it to cut through the skies and slither rapidly towards its prey.
Banish Ravenous Leviathan. Place card E33 into play with the same number of tokens on it that Ravenous Leviathan had before transforming. Do not resolve this minion's Persisten effect this turn.

name: Conduct Story
effect text:
Your ability to store charges has caught the eye of the Nameless. They seek that power, and will hunt you down to feed upon you. You are able to draw more charges from their attacks, which only make you more of a target.
Banish Conduct. Place card E35 in the nemesis discard pile. Write the name of the player who suffered damage from Conduct on E35.
Do not read any more cards in this deck until instructed to do so.

name: Daze Story
effect text:
The Nameless seeks to disrupt your balance, striking in ways to ruin your concentration. You find yourself unable to keep track of the Nameless, and feel helpless in this battle.
Banish Daze. Place card E37 in the nemesis discard pile.
Do not read any more cards in this deck until instructed to do so.

name: Tremor Story
effect text:
The Nameless seeks to destroy New Gravehold, but your people's resilience only angers it further. You sense they have learned something crucial about your defense, something that will make the next attack that much harder to hold off.
Banish Tremor. Place card E39 in the nemesis discard pile.
Do not read any more cards in this deck until instructed to do so.

name: Caustic Cocoon Story
effect text:
You watch in horror as the Cocoon begins to break apart, unleashing the monstrosity that was gestating within. Acid coats the ground, dissolving anything it touches. The emerging creature is covered in this toxin.
Banish Caustic Cocoon. Place card E41 into play with the same number of life tokens on it that Caustic Cocoon had before transforming. Do not resolve this minion's Persistent effect this turn.

name: Drain Story

The Nameless have learned to adapt to your attacks, watching and waiting for you to prep your strongest spells before striking. In the future you must be more careful, as the Nameless are growing smarter.

A figure jerkily stumbles into view from behind a massive tree trunk. Her words are slurred, "Get back." Suddenly, her eyes narrow in on you as her hands raise. You recognize the spell she's about to cast.
Place this card next to Brama, Infested. When Brama, Infested is discard, read the back of this card.
Do not read any more cards in this deck until instructed to do so.
Your attacks disrupted Fungal Mesh's control over Brama. In the moments before fainting, she musters enough willpower to aid you. Brama heals one of you. Any player gains 2 life.
Return this card to the evolve deck.

name: Smoke Guardian Appears

A glowing figure emerges from the dense fog surrounding your battle. Its sharp edges and razor teeth are eerily illuminated by its innate aura, turning it into a nightmarish vision.
Place this card next to Smoke Guardian. When Smoke guardian is discarded, read the back of this card.
Do not read any more cards in this deck until instructed to do so.

The player who discarded Smoke Guardian gains a gem from the most expensive gem supply pile and places it into their hand.
Return this card to the evolve deck.

The Kinetic Construct appears, a glowing configuration of prisms and shapes, crackling with a cascade of energy. Arcs of electricity spout from the beast, shocking Brama and pinning her to the ground.

As the lifeless construct crumbles, Brama is free to redirect the stores of energy she was using to defend herself.
The player who discard Kinetic Construct gains a card, that gains pulse tokens, from any supply pile. That player does nto suffer damage from Deathmind for gaining this card.
Return this card to the evolve deck.

Maelstrom emits a sound you recognize from the first time you fought it. That sound summoned Bladius. Having escaped your battle with it months ago, Bladius is back to serve Maelstrom. He is battle-scarred and broken, yet its one good eye glares at you with a desire for bengeance boring on madness. Return this card to the evolve deck.

The prelatus finally falls to your assault. Wasting no time, you rush to its side and absorb as much of its energy as possible. Xaxos takes notice and shrieks with rage. You narrowly avoid a blast of flame as you retrat to a more defensible position. The player who discard Pretalus of Lore tucks this card under one of their opened breaches. For the rest of the game, spells cast from this breach deal 1 additional damage.
At the end of the game, return this card to the Evolve deck.
+1 Damage on Cast.

name: Turn Reminder
effect text:
Player Turn
Casting Phase
You may Cast any of your prepped spells in opened breaches. You must Cast any of your prepped spells in closed breaches. Place cast spells on top of your discard pile as they are cast.
Main Phase
You may resolve the following actions in any order and as many times as you want:
• Play a gem or relic card
• Gain a card
• Focus a breach
• Open a breach
• Prep a spell to a breach
• Resolve a "While prepped" effect
• Resolve a "To Discard" effect
• Gain a charge
• Activate your ability
Draw Phase Place all the gems and relics that you have played this turn on top of your discard pile in any order you choose. Draw cards from the top of your deck until you have five cards in your hand.
Nemesis Turn
Main Phase
From oldest to newest, resolve the effect of each power card and the Persistent: effect of each minion card the nemesis has in play.
Draw Phase
Draw a card from the nemesis deck.
• If it is an attack card: Resolve its effect immediately.
• If it is a minion card or a power card:
Place it into play with the appropriate number of life or power tokens.
Resolve any effects following "Immediately:" on the card.
The rest of its effects will not be resolve this turn.

name: Maelstrom Emerges
effect text:
Gravehold is under siege. As apprentices, you are not prepared but you must fight.
If you are player with 1/2/3 players, discard the top 4/4/2 cards of the nemesis deck respectively. Place this c ard in the nemesis discard pile. Then, draw a new nemesis card.

name: Doom Crawler
effect text: Persistent: Any player suffers 1 damage.

name: Dezmodia's Bombardment
effect text: Dezmodia continues to rise in the air, radiating so brightly it's difficult to look at her. "You did well buying us time. Now, I can end this. Take care of Gravehold." The cavern walls are rocked to their core as Dezmodia releases all of her stored energy at Maelstrom.

name: Brama's Rally
effect text:
"This is our last stand!" Brama cries out. "We need to hold out just a little longer! Weaken Maelstrom enough so that Dezmodia can deliver the final blow." Your mentor glows for a moment and fades. Suddenly, your wounds mend on their own.
Any player gains 2 life.

name: Mist's Inferno
effect text:
You watch fire streak above your head. You follow the smoke trail back to Mist, perched atop a crumbling building, throwing flame as fast as she can. "We've done all we can. Help Dezmodia finish off Maelstrom," she commands.
Mist deals 15 damage to Maelstrom.

name: Dezmodia's Plan
effect text: The next time you see Dezmodia she is fully glowing, a sparkling pattern seems to lift her off her skin, lighting the rubble around her. Her body is encased in swirling energy as she lifts off the ground. "Keep holding, apprentices. My attack is nearly ready, just a few moments longer..."

name: Xaxos Arrives
effect text:
Xaxos appears besides you, one hand clutching his wounded side. "I can fix this," he yells. He lashes solid black energy from his shadow across Maelstrom's shell. Doubled over with pain, Xaxos stumbles through a breach and vanishes from the battle.
Xaxos deals 10 damage to Maelstrom.

name: Malastar's Boon
effect text:
Malastar stumbles from a cloud of debris, coughing and covering his mouth. "It's up to you now," he wheezes. "This will help."
Any player gains a Gravity Node from the supply and places it into their hand.

name: Dezmodia's Assault
effect text:
Dezmodia drops down from above, her hands beginning to glow as power spreads along her arms. A burst of light escapes her, crashing into Maelstrom as it lets out a pained screech.
Dezmodia deals 10 damage to Maelstrom.

name: Mist's Fury
effect text:
The battle rages on, and the air is filled with ash, clouding your vision. Suddenly, Mist whips a lava tendril from the fog, striking the Nameless hard enough to crack its outer shell.
Mists deals 10 damage to Maelstrom.

name: Chapter 1 Introduction
effect text:
On the morning of your ordeal you awake to your barracks door slamming open. Brama and Mist enter, lifting a wounded breach mage, Xaxos, from a stretcher to one of the empty beds.
"You arrogant fool!" Brama chides.
Xaxos clutches his injured side. "We need the power," he groans. "I didn't know..."
"You have doomed us all," Mist snaps, pressing two fingers against her temple, trying to concentrate. Outside, alarm bells ring as an earthquake shakes the very foundation of the building. In the distance, you hear explosions.
Mist looks grave. "It is here."
Xaxos, face white with terror, moans, "No..."
Read the back of this card.
Brama and Mist leave Xaxos as they rush to defend Gravehold, and you follow, knowing you must do whatever you can to help.
You emerge into chaos: Gravehold is burning and screams fill the air. Above you, a breach swirls, the largest you hav eever seen, expelling a colossal orb of blades. Fireballs pelt the Nameless, but its minions are plentiful. You can only watch as one mage is torn to pieces by a bladed warrior. As the flames push back the darkness, you see the bulking form of your foe descending, surrounded by its ruthless army.
Brama staggers away from the fray, coughing and crading a freshly wounded arm.
Ready the front of L03.

name: Chapter 1 Introduction (cont.)
effect text:
"Dezmodia and Malastar are holding the line, but we are overwhelmed! You have much to learn, but there is no time to spare. Gather your wits and hold off these creatures however you can. Focus on the minions to protect the breach mages. You must work together! Give them the openings they need and let us focus on the Nameless. Each of you are a link in the chain. Do not break."
Read Maelstrom's setup instructions.
Then, fight Maelstrom and save Gravehold.
At the end of your game versus Maelstrom, if you won, read the back of this card, if you lost, read the front of card L04.
You watch from the edge of the carverns as Dezmodia faces off against Maelstrom: one bright light against the terrible darkness. Luckily, you managed to do the impossible: hold off Maelstrom's minions long enough to safely evacuate Gravehold. The survivors huddle behind you, terrified, as Dezmodia erupts before them. The entire cavern shakes and collapses. Towers fall and buildings crash down upon Maelstrom, buring it underneath a mountain of rubble. Your home, Gravehold, is no more. At least you led many of its citizens to safety.
Read the back of card L04.

name: Chapter 1 Conclusion
effect text:
As Dezmodia erupts into violent light, the world begins to fall apart. Falling rock crashes around you and buildings tumble to the ground. It is all you can do not to pass out as you struggle to crawl away, but you can hardly move. Just as the world turns black you see Mist appear above you, hands in the air, projecting a field to deflect the falling rock as others drag you away to safety. When you awake, you find yourself feep in Gravehold's tunnel system with the few who made it out safely.
Read the back of this card.
Gravehold is gone, lost beneath the rubble along with your friends, teachers, Dezmodia, and most of the other mages. You recognize Mist and Malastar among the survivors,tending to the wounded. Xaxos is among them, his eyes hollow. "This is your fault!" Mist screams at him, tears in her eyes. Xaxos backs away slowly. "I didn't mean to... I was only trying to protect us..." His words become unclear as a dark breach opens behind him.
"Close it, Xaxos!" Brama shouts. "I beg you."
Xaxos vanishes into the void, his last words echoing in the tunnel. "I'm sorry..."
Read the front of L05.

name: Chapter 1 Conclusion (cont.)
effect text:
"It takes a true ordeal to access your inner power," Brama explains. "While others search for survivors, you will train with me. Only then will you be able to serve the survivors of Gravehold."
Follow the end of game instructions on page 20 of the rulebook.
Each player finds the card that matches their mage from Legacy deck cards L06-L13. Banish the other cards.
Open Insight 1.
Each player choses one of the Starter Card Effects and adds it to their card.
Place the Starting Hand sticker over the 4x Crystal 1x Spark listed in the Starting Hand section on your player mat.
Choose a name for your starter card and write it on the card and on the new blank space on Starting Hand.
Banish a Crystal from your starting hand.
Read the back of this card.
Banish the Maelstrom nemesis mat, nemesis deck, and Assist cards.
Open Stop Ⅰd deck. This deck contains your supply upgrades. Replace two supply piles in the current supply with the upgrade supply piles of the same types, so that there are three gems, two relics, and four spells in the supply. Banish the cards you did not choose and the ones you removed from the supply.
When you are ready to start Chapter 2, read the front of L14.
